chapter.title: Testing
chapter.para: Notes on unit tests and manual test cases that could be implemented.

section.title: Unit Testing
section.para: These items are related to unit testing

listitem.para: Try to add utf-8 and utf-16/UCS strings to libardour test utils
Test timestretch using different files, lengths etc. Crash or distortion on timestretch
Session test that programmaticaly creates a session and writes it to a directory that contains the arch/platform it was built on and the build identifier

Automatic stress/stability testing of Audioengine/Session paths at various buffer sizes, samplerates etc. This will require some sort of simultaneous loading of system subsystems etc. perhaps via phoronix test integration

section.title: Test Cases
section.para: Test Cases for checking that functionality in Ardour is working as expected.

These Test Cases include images of the expected user interface elements that are used for interaction during the tests. These may vary slightly on different platforms so that should be indicated or accounted for if there are major differences(with different reference images)

Having reference images of the user interface while performing the Tests will make it easier to understand the expected result. It can also be used to indicate when the user interface has been changed and the test cases and perhaps sections in the manual/guides need to be updated.
